text: Not sure if this is a recent change or I just haven't noticed this before, but in the blog publishing tool, can the publish date of unpublished posts default to the current date during editing? I've been asked by a few editors/clients now why their sites say the article publish date is Dec. 31, 1969...
you mean you don't enjoy explaining unix time to your clients? :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:
Oh I'm happy to do it, they just don't seem to get the same thrill out of learning about it :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:
